content.detailedDescription: We were driving home when we saw a bright light hovering about 2-300 feet abovean open field.  when we got close enough to make out a triangle shape it tookoff at extremely high speed heading south towards klamath falls
content.summary: Three triangle shaped ufos seen over the klamath s
Extremely loud jet roar over head 15-30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: In conroe tx, getting in the pick up with 2 sons at 5 am.Sam asked if it was aufo.I looked to high but then at tree top view westward maybe 1 mile.I saw whatwould seem huge at that distance, a flat long view with lights like circles allalong it.First bright,then dimmer,then disapear.It seemed as it could be vshaped,like partial view of the other side slightly raise in view,but not aslong, so hard to figure.At arms length aprox 8long by 1/2 high, many circlelights evenly the whole lenght.Definent flat edge,but edge more defined thenrest of surface .It moved slightly to lower altitude as it moved south, thenvanished from view with no obstructions to explain the disapearence.
content.summary: We saw a huge flat thing with lights.Bright,dim

content.detailedDescription: At 9:36pm on march 4, 2001, i was waiting for a bus at the corner of se 82nd andfoster in portland, or.  i had noticed a bright red light in the sky to thenorthwest. i thought it was a plane, but it didnt move or blink. i then thoughtof a star, but it was raining and i couldnt see any stars or the moon.  theobject remained in the same position for about 10-12 minutes.  the wind wasblowing clouds around it so it kind of faded in and out but you could tell itwas clouds.  the whole time it was in the sky, i watched it, only taking my eyesoff of it to check for my bus and to check the time.  as i was watching it, moreclouds eventually covered it completely and i lost track of it around 9:46pm. my bus arrived shortly after and when i got to work (it was a five minute ride)i checked the sky again, but it wasnt there.
content.summary: Sighting in portland, oregon?

content.detailedDescription: Correcting the date as noted by witness- removed subsequent cases she made tocorrectwufod admin -d
content.summary: A stationary aircraft with serrated wings

content.detailedDescription: In my car driving home one night, i saw some lights moving towards me as idrove, its what i thought was a helicopter.  it moved towards me and was movingslow over some trees, i looked up at it only for a second and continued on. when i got a mile or so down the road it didnt seem right, so i turned aroundagain and continued home.  about a half mile down the road i saw it above afield moving slowly.  i lost sight of it behind some barns but when it passed istopped my car and looked up, it was 30 ft. up and 30 ft. off the road and ithad three glowing globes in an triangle about three feet apart with a dimflashing light in the center.  i rolled my window down to get a better look atit, it made no noise.  when i couldnt make out what it was i got the hell outof there.  when i got home i called the state police and reported it.  it gaveme goose bumps from head to toe!  i drive that road often and havent seen itsince.
content.summary: Triangle light formation seen in deerfield twp., m

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed looking up through a skylight. i saw four bright lightssuddenly appear in the sky. first i thought it was four stars but they were toobright. as the lights began moving in a row i realised that they were not starsand i followed their movement. i thought that it was very cool at the time.After wards i had a headache. the object had four bright white lights in a row.They moved in unison, hovered and disappeared.
content.summary: Four bright moving lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin kellyn were outside in her backyard gardening and she sawsomething in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane but it got bigger andglowed brightly. we got scared and ran into the house. we then ran back outsidewith more witnesses and it was still there but they didnt find it i the sky.The object was suacer shaped and glowed brightly. eventuly it gained altituteand disappeared
content.summary: Me and my cousin was outside and saw something in
3ufos rising 1 at a time, stop, rapid triangulatio

content.detailedDescription: I feel that what i saw was a satellite.  the reason for reporting this sightingis to comfirm if a satellite can be seen at 2pm.
content.summary: Possible sattlite sighting

content.detailedDescription: Picking up daughter in cloquet. looking out window. some sort of flying object.Excited. listend for a sound and none was present.  triangle shaped withstar-like lights on the corners.  moved across the sky quickly. no engine noise.It left sight-trees. one year later, almost to date it flew over my house about8 miles away and made the sound like a bird when it flys over your head in thewoods.
content.summary: Silent, stealth bomber shaped, see through, star-l

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in an old drive-in movie theatre parking lot.When, all ofa sudden, i observed 4-6 bubbles(transparent) with an inner light source wereoverhead and coming closer to me... and thats all i remember about theexperience... after the experience a few days later, i noticed two incisions inmy genital area. and, theyre still present to this day...Never having themchecked out by a doctor...Im really wondering what the hell they are. if you oranyone else known have any idea what they are...Please contact me.For years ihave thought that im going crazy...Because, i cant recall the time loss or thestrange incisions...Thank you for reading about this...And, please guide me toanyone, besides the government, to help me to learn about what has happened tome.
content.summary: 5 or 6 transparent bubbles, w/ an inner light sour

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of wed.24 jan 2001 i woke at 05:10, sitting up and lookingoutthrough our east facing window (we sleep with curtains open) i observedwhat ifirst took to be a star, my attention was drawn by its unusualsparklingappearance akin to a sparkler -firework, it then began to move in avery jerkyfashion, not unlike the flight of a butterfly, the generaldirection of movementwas south to north. i woke my wife (a skeptic) who,when i showed her, had toagree it was indeed a ufo. we continued to observeuntil it disappeared from ourview - still travelling northward. the morning was not yet fully light, therewas only a little wispy cloud above the object, and the whole sighting lastedabout five minutes.
content.summary: Sparkler - firework star
Large grey oval object sighted in northern califor

content.detailedDescription: first (10)seconds3e3e observed (3) white lights in the sky in the south end of the city3e travelling in a triangular formation evenly spaced3e 1st(top of the triangle) light stopped instantly letting the other3e two pass (both travelling at seperate speeds)3e 1st light then moves from a standing stop to a quick right turn3e 2nd light (bottom left of the triangle) slows letting 3rd pass3e 3rd light (bottom right of the triangle) speeds up passing 2nd3e 1st light moves very quickly left and behind the 3rd3e 2nd light zooms beside the 1st formming an off shaped triangle3e3e last 3 to 5 seconds3e3e 1st and 3rd light veer to the east3e 2nd light continues south3e3e all vanish3e3e these lights were travelling to fast and to close to be planes or helicopters3e their manuvers were to smooth and abrupt3e and they all consisted of one (1) singular non flashing light3e
content.summary: Lights sighted in ottawa sky
Metallic sphere and white disk - daytime sightings

content.detailedDescription: As a small child my sister, our neighbors randy ,age6,jeff,age4, myself,age4,and their father,jerry don wiggins, saw a large ufo hover overhead without asound. it was a nice clear day, we childeren playing in their backyard, and wesaw a silver ufo 100yards long, 50yards high fly over at about 150-200feet inthe air.It was going south at maybe 5mph.It had windows like an airplane all theway around and we could see peoples heads looking down at us. we went to getour mother to come see ,but see did not belive us.Mr wiggins came out and sawit. we chased after it until it dissappeard over the pine trees towards the kogtam radio station in orange,tx.We called the radio station to tell themm about itand the incident was and still is quite a disscussion topic in our family.Pleaselimit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: Ufo sighting broad daylight 1967

content.detailedDescription: 21:05 est. clear sky. i was outside, in front of my house facing east and justhappened to look up about 45 degrees to see 2 steady pale yellow-white lightsflying east to west at an extremely fast rate. it passed about directly overheadand proceeded to fly off to the horizon in the west, possibly jinking a bit tothe north at about 45 degrees above the western horizon. this all took under 10seconds. more like 5. the two lights moved parallel to each other and may havebeen two lights on either side of a dark central structure. there was no soundand the object(s) must either have been huge, or low level, as several normalaircraft were in the air at the same time and their running lights appeared muchsmaller than these lights. the lights did not change in intensity, it simplykept going west until i could no longer see it. i thought at first it may havebeen mir or the new space station or shuttle, but dont these objects travelwest to east? there were no trails of any sort.
content.summary: Pair of lights moving rapidly east to west.
Ufo in clinton and ogden utah. large i was standin

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside, looked up to the sky and saw a round, gold, darker gold objectthat also had two lines that were vertical. it went in a stait line thendisapeared into nothing.
content.summary: Gold, round object with two vertical lines

content.detailedDescription: We were out in the woods south of london when we saw this large metallic objectcome towards us and land. it was there and it didnt look normal, like it wassomething from a movie or whatever. marco wanted to leave so he got in the carand tried to start it but it wouldnt go. jake went after him but i just stoodthere. then jake came back and these two things came out from behind it (likethey came out the back side and walked around) then these two things cametowards us and one had a metal sheet in its hand. then the looked at us for likea few minutes and left. we went back to the car and marco had fallen asleep sowe woke him up and drove off, and we were all like calm and all but it wasunbelievable.
content.summary: We saw an object that we believe was not of this w

content.detailedDescription: Submitted by investigator via e-mail...Witness reported seeing a silent, very low altitude erratic flying objectwhile driving on 1-75 at 3:20 a.M. south of venice, florida.  it was firstseen at approximately 45 degrees above the horizon at a distance of about500 feet.  the object had a varied surface and its basic color and shapewere muted (there was some fog), but it reflected the lights in shades ofbeige, yellow, orange and brown.  it had a beam light with a yellowish aura.The object was first sighted coming from a northwesterly direction and lastobserved moving to the southwest.  its movements resembled those of afalling leaf.  the witness has spent years in the marine corps and knowsflight dynamics so he wondered how any aircraft could move in this fashion.At one point the vehicle appeared to stall because it decelerated andstopped, then started again.The closest distance the witness was to the object was about 200 feet, whenit came down and hovered over a vehicle parked on the highway.  from thisdistance it appeared larger than a camper but not as large as a truck.  atthis point the witness said his own vehicle stopped and he had to start itagain. he rolled down the window and all sounds seemed to be muted. witnesssaid his automobile was in perfect condition and had never stalled before.
content.summary: Silent, very low altitude, erratic flying object

content.detailedDescription: At the age of 12 i saw a big cigarshaped ufo slowly and silently following ahorizontal path over gothenburg , sweden. i was with my parents , and alsojoined by 3 adult neighbours. it was silvercolored and reflected the light ofthe afternoon sun. every 10 seconds (appr) it lit up compleately like alight-bulb and 10 seconds later ,the light was turned off and it was againsilvercolored.We saw no lights, windows or fens on the cigar- it was compleatelysmooth. no sound.After about 5-10 minutes it suddenly turned around, and tookoff in the direction from where it had come .The speed was now accelerating andit went from horizon to horizon in a few seconds
content.summary: Cigarshaped ufo
An incredibly bright light pulses on the horizon

content.detailedDescription: While driving we noticed this neon green light, penny size zip accross the skyand disappear. we saw the light of a plain and this green light was higher thenthe plain light it seemed to fly out into the clouds. i dont know what it was,maybe it something that usually happens in modesto, but i,m not from there. ifthere is an explaination ild like to hear it. thank you
content.summary: Neon green light penny size high in the sky zipped
